short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Helper for AliExpress. Export Orders as CSV. Download videos and user uploaded images. Export reviews.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be more efficient with this AliExpress tool.
It has been updated to work with latest browser version
- Click in the extension to open AliExpress directly
- Export as CSV your Order List information, including buyer address, country and contact details
- Get the seller's product pictures and videos!!
- Get all the user review pictures in a convenient scrollable page
- Get the users reviews, rates and dates as CSV

What is currently not working in version 5.1 (but is planned to be added again)
- Generation of invoices from the orders
- Possibility of adding tracking information
- Export Shopping cart information
- Remove search results filtering by number of reviews

From the extension icon:
- Open Aliexpress directly
- Download Order list as CSV file. Includes order information, from orderId to destination address, ideal for dropshippers. You just need to select the starting date and click a button.

From the product page:
- Download an HTML file with all the seller pictures, ideal for your dropshipping store!
- Download an HTML file with all the images from the reviews, gather all pictures from multiple pages in a single file
- Download a CSV file with all the reviews from non-anonymous users. It includes the name, date, rate and comments. It automatically filters out empty reviews.

Furthermore, you can process your data afterwards, use Excel, LibreOffice or Google sheets to track all of your orders, set alerts and do statistics. Just beware that field separator is | instead of comma ,

Download order details currently exports:
- Oder Number and When it was placed
- At which store and how much was paid
- Destination address and buyer contact details
- Product details: name, id, image link, quantity, attributes, price

The tool is provided free of charge. To support its development, it will show a banner once every some days if the extension is not used to open AliExpress page

Update v5.1: Fixes in item page to show again the buttons to download images
Update v5.2: Adds the Order status to the order export information
Update v5.3: Fixes an odd bug in 5.2, issues warning with errors like page not in English. It does not download empty order lists.
